name: Kaerimashou
description:
Maybe if I take the shortcut through the alleyway it won't be so bad, at least I'll get home sooner.... right?

Kaerimashou is a short game about walking home together alone. Help guide Yu to the end of the shortcut so he can get home. There are 3 possible endings to achieve.

If you liked the game, feel free to create a playthrough and share it with me! You can also share it on Twitter and mention me @strawbbsukeban if you'd like!

(Recommended to play in full-screen with headphones)

(Mac and Windows builds are set to full-screen by default)
